info.name: Blend Docutech Integration
info.description:
## Blend Docutech Integration API Documentation

This documentation provides an overview of the endpoints and authentication for the Blend Docutech Integration API. The API allows you to interact with Blend's integration with Docutech to manage disclosures packages for specific accounts.

### Authentication

The Blend Docutech Integration API enforces Basic Authentication to secure access to its endpoints. These credentials are generated by Mulesoft and contracts are created per application ( tenant ).

### Endpoints

The following endpoints are available in the Blend Docutech Integration API:

---

### Create/Update/Complete Disclosures Package

- **Endpoint:** `post ext/v1/accounts/:accountId/disclosures-package`
  - `:accountId` (path parameter): The unique identifier (GUID) generated by Docutech to determine the tenant configuration for the account.
- **Description**: Creates, updates, or completes a disclosures package for a specific account. In addition to disclosures, these events can control the closing integration.
- **Method:** POST
- **Authentication:** Basic Authentication

#### Request

- **Headers:**
  - `Authorization: Basic [base64-encoded-credentials]`
  - `Content-Type: application/xml`

- **Body:**
```xml
<LOAN_PUSHBACK_PACKAGE _OrderID="1de9f1ff-78e0-45d1-b63e-98324502e77g" _LoanDistributionMethod="eSign" _ReasonForPushback="DocumentDistribution" _EnvironmentDescription="staging" _PushbackDateTime="5/4/2023 4:01:28 PM" _LoanNumber="30102404" _DocumentPackageType="Initial Disclosure" _IsGFERedisclosure="false" _IsAlternateConfiguration="false" _AlternateConfigurationId="" _AlternateConfigurationName="" _IsClosingDisclosureRedisclosure="false" _ClientId="C771">
  <BLEND>
  <BORROWERS>
    <BORROWER1 _FirstName="Andy" _LastName="America" _FullName="Andy America" _SSN="111-11-1111" _DOB="8/12/1978" _1003IncludesAdditionalBorrower="0" _EmailAddress="ldimas+b1@blend.com" _IsCoSigner="0">
      <ADDRESS _Street="1234 S Fake St" _State="AZ" _City="Tucson" _Zip="85718" />
    </BORROWER1>
  </BORROWERS>
  <ADDITIONAL_LOAN_DATA ClosingDate="06/15/2023" LoanAmount="647500" LoanPurpose="0" Heloc="0" IframeVendor="C636" _RemoteOnlineNotarizationIndicator="2" />
  <LENDER_PARTIES>
    <LOAN_OFFICER _Name="Luke Dimas" _EmailAddress="ldimas@blend.com" />
  </LENDER_PARTIES>
  <PROPERTY _Occupancy="0" _Value="1295000.00" _Type="1381">
    <ADDRESS _City="Tucson" _State="AZ" _Street="4049 E Playa de Coronado" _Zip="85718" />
  </PROPERTY>
  <NON_PURCHASING_ENTITIES>
    <NPE1 _ListedOnTitle="1" />
    <NPE2 _ListedOnTitle="2" />
    <NPE3 _ListedOnTitle="2" />
    <NPE4 _ListedOnTitle="2" />
  </NON_PURCHASING_ENTITIES>
</BLEND>
  <EVENT_DATA>
    <ESIGN _HUDBookletDistributed="N" _CHARMBookletDistributed="N" _ToolkitBookletDistributed="Y" _SolexDistributionId="2c11ffc2-930d-4939-9b1c-b1ea8ec11058" _EstimatedDistributionExpireDate="5/11/2023 4:01:21 PM">
      <PARTY _Type="Borrower" _Name="ANDY AMERICA" _ID="Borrower1" _BorrowerID="BORROWER_1" _SignerID="BORROWER_1" _DocLink="https://stage.stg.solex.com/welcome/79c27cc2-9e6a-44c6-ab20-2f3c5c2db1cd" _DocLinkExpireDate="5/11/2023 4:01:21 PM MDT" _EmailAddress="ldimas+b1@blendcom.com" _ConsentByDate="5/11/2023 4:01:21 PM MDT" _SolexPartyId="1" />
    </ESIGN>
  </EVENT_DATA>
</LOAN_PUSHBACK_PACKAGE>
```


## Retrieve Tenant Configurations

- **Endpoint**: `GET /ext/v1/tenants/:tenant`
- **Description**: This endpoint is used to retrieve tenant configurations, including document mappings and feature flags.
- **Parameters**:
  - `:tenant` (string): The name of the tenant.
- **Response**: Returns the configurations and settings for the specified tenant.
```json
{
    "config": {
        "tenants": {
            "CC312BA4-9A65-4D25-82E0-77C76115E2E0": {
                "blendTargetInstanceHeader": "intg-docutech-dev~default"
            }
        },
        "blendTenants": {
            "intg-docutech-dev~default": {
                "redirect": "?redirecturl=https://",
                "host": "intg-docutech-dev.beta.blendlabs.com",
                "path": "/home/welcome",
                "loanSync": "ON",
                "borrowerSync": "ON",
                "NPE": "OFF",
                "eclose": "ON",
                "PopulatingSystemRefID": "OFF",
                "traditionalClose": "ON",
                "closingPreferenceTypeIndicator": "ON",
                "lenderSupport": "ON",
                "LQB_Order_ID": "OFF",
                "setReferenceNumberAsLoanNumber": "OFF",
                "docNameAdditionalPushbackAttributes": "ON",
                "distributionQuery": "ON",
                "addLoanProcessor": "ON",
                "alternateSettlementAgentEmail": "ON",
                "skipDocumentExport": "ON",
                "ignoreDocuments": "19349",
                "allComplete_customMetadata": "ON",
                "hybridDocTypeClosingPackage": "ON",
                "disableConsent": "ON",
                "bulkDocumentImport": "ON"
            }
        },
        "msutil-email-alerts-api": {
            "intg-docutech-dev~default": {
                "email_to": "intg-docutech-notifications@blend.com",
                "loansync_email_to": "intg-docutech-notifications@blend.com",
                "platform_email_to": "intg-docutech-notifications@blend.com",
                "borrowersync_email_to": "intg-docutech-notifications@blend.com"
            }
        },
        "docutech": {
            "tenants": {
                "intg-docutech-dev~default": {
                    "auth": {
                        "host": "stage.auth.stg.docutech.app",
                        "url": "https://stage.auth.stg.docutech.app/connect/token"
                    },
                    "res": {
                        "host": "stage.stg.solex.com"
                    },
                    "jwtClaims": {
                        "aud": "https://stage.auth.stg.docutech.app",
                        "acr": "https://stage.auth.stg.docutech.app/policy/acr/1",
                        "iss": "01BE84AC-0071-4F3B-8A11-F989986E820D",
                        "sub": "CC312BA4-9A65-4D25-82E0-77C76115E2E0"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "disclosures-mapping": {
        "INITIAL_LOAN_ESTIMATE": "Initial Disclosure,TILA Redisclosure",
        "CLOSING_DISCLOSURE": "Closing,Pre-Closing",
        "CLOSING_PACKAGE": "Closing",
        "OTHER_LOAN_DISCLOSURE": "Appraisal,Adverse Action,Initial Disclosure,Pre-Disclosure",
        "CLOSING_LOAN_DISCLOSURE": "Closing,Pre-Closing",
        "REVISED_LOAN_ESTIMATE": "Redisclosure",
        "OTHER_DISCLOSURE": {
            "Appraisal": {
                "empw_value_net_exterior": "Appraisal",
                "empw_value_net_interior": "Appraisal",
                "empw_appraisal_recertification": "Appraisal",
                "empw_field_review": "Appraisal",
                "empw_final_inspection": "Appraisal",
                "empw_appraisal_existing_loan": "Appraisal",
                "empw_exterior_appraisal": "Appraisal",
                "NoAlternateConfigurationName": "Appraisal",
                "empw_dvi": "Appraisal",
                "empw_avm": "Appraisal"
            },
            "Initial_Disclosure": {
                "empw_flood_package": "Flood Package",
                "pre-approval_package": "Preliminary Pre-Approval"
            },
            "Pre-Closing": {
                "initial_closing_disclosure": "Initial Closing Disclosure"
            },
            "providerPackageDescription": {
                "Description": "This package contains information explaining full terms and conditions governing the home equity line of credit product, our Privacy Notice, Borrowerâ€™s Authorization and the package of initial disclosures."
            },
            "Pre-Disclosure": {
                "NoAlternateConfigurationName": "Pre-Disclosure"
            }
        }
    }
}
```
